text: Vibes is a 1988 American romantic adventure comedy movie directed by Ken Kwapis and starring Cyndi Lauper, Jeff Goldblum, Julian Sands, Peter Falk, Elizabeth Pe√±a, Steve Buscemi, Van Dyke Parks, Park Overall, Max Perlich. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was not a box office success. ==Other websites== * * Category:1988 romantic comedy movies Category:1988 adventure movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Kwapis Category:Movies set in Ecuador Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Vibes (movie)
